text:
Hey guys it’s Ro, I wanted to make a quick
update video because, I have some updates
to share.

The first update is I’m gonna be on a Disney TV
show, I am so excited, this is one of those

secret projects that I was working on that
I couldn’t share until now, the TV show

is called Bizaardvark, and the episode that
I was in airs tomorrow, Sunday the 11th, on
the Disney Channel at 8PM Eastern time.

But make sure to check your local listing
to see which time it airs for you.

I’m gonna be watching it, probably gonna
be live tweeting, so send me pictures if you

are also watching it, I’m so excited, I
absolutely love Disney, I grew up watching

Disney, so, getting to be on one of their
TV shows…
Oooooh!
Just made my day!

Also, a big thank you to the cast and the
crew, I had so much fun, they were kind and

welcoming, it was an amazing experience being
on set.
It felt like a second home.

Also a big thank you to the director John,
for walking me through the process, he made
everything so enjoyable and I learned so much.

So, big thank you to all of them, I had so
much fun.

This was just a little milestone moment for me, I’m
just glad I get to share it with you guys.

Second update, there is now a German version
of the Nerdy Nummies Cookbook!

It’s really an incredible feeling to see
a cookbook that you’ve made be translated
into another language.

Look, on the front right here, Baking for
Nerds, it’s ‘Baken Fur Nerds!’
Let’s open this up and see a recipe!

Oh my gosh yes, so these are the Unicorn Poop
Cookies, but in German, Einhorn-Häufchen Cookies!

I don’t speak German, so I’m probably
saying this wrong, but I just think it’s

so cool that they translated everything in
the book.

So if any of you would like to get a German
version of the Nerdy Nummies Cookbook, I will

put a link down below, you just go to NerdyNummiesCookbook.com
and you can find it there.

Third and final update, for those of you who
are following me on Snapchat or Instagram

Stories or Twitter, you know that I am packing,
I have moving boxes everywhere.

I’m moving to a new place, I started moving
in December, but I am the slowest mover ever!

I don’t know in the Guiness World Records,
who is the slowest mover ever, but, I think
I’m probably a contender.
I only got 200 more of these!
Three!

And I know what you’re asking, why don’t
you hire movers to help you Ro?
Because, I’m independent woman!
I have very high energy, but I move slowly…
Lightning in a bottle.
Lightning in a bottle!

I also wanted to let you guys know that I
am going to continue to film Nerdy Nummies

in this Kitchen during the transition, but I may
film some new videos at the new place.

So you’ll see videos from both places while
I’m in transition.
It’s just kind of wherever I am that day.

Alright, those are all of my updates, I hope
you guys can check out Bizaardvark tomorrow,

I’ll be watching, I’ll be retweeting,
and I have got to get back to packing.
Bye-bye.
Signed, sealed, delivered, I’m yours!
Lightning in a bottle!
